thread.title: Desperate mum captured on CCTV jumping off balcony after being gang-raped by five men
thread.title_full: Desperate mum captured on CCTV jumping off balcony after being gang-raped by five men

author: Kara O'Neill
title: Desperate mum captured on CCTV jumping off balcony after being gang-raped by five men
text:
Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A woman who was gang-raped by five brutes was forced to jump off a balcony in a bid to escape her attackers. 
Five men have been arrested for allegedly raping the 26-year-old in east Delhi's Pandav Nagar region in India. 
The victim was reportedly locked in a flat yesterday by the men who took it in turns to rape her until the early hours of this morning. 
A senior police officer said she was eventually forced to jump off the balcony to escape. The woman was forced to jump off a balcony to escape her attackers (Photo: Press Trust Of India) 
The five men, Lakshay Bhalla, Vikas Kumar, Naveen, Swarit and Prateek by officers. 
The woman was allegedly picked up by Vikas, who asked her to accompany him to a party. 
In the woman's statement, she confirmed that she knows Vikas. 
Vikas allegedly left the flat, telling the woman he had some work to do, and said he would return in the morning to pick her up, although he later returned to the flat, after the woman had been forced to drink alcohol. 
At around 5.30am, the woman managed to gain access to the balcony and jumped. A man finally came to the woman's rescue after she escaped (Photo: Press Trust Of India) 
She was injured by the fall and passers-by reportedly made no effort to help her after seeing her condition. Read More Partner of top British sportsman 'raped by male friend' at their family home 
One man eventually stopped to assist her and informed to police after she told him about the sexual assault . 
A police officer said: "The woman was admitted to Lal Bahadur Shastri Hospital for medical treatment and examination. She has sustained minor injuries in her legs. 
Police have confirmed the investigation is ongoing . Like us on Facebook
